hyp: Ants, especially red ones, produce formic acid to sting predators, capture food and defend themselves.', 'One Internet expert says the formic acid in ants makes them taste citrusy, like a lemon.', 'Ants are edible and there are people that eat them as a delicacy not usually as primary source of food.', In Laos (Lao PDR), there is a salad which includes live ants and ants' eggs., Actually i didn't try it but as i know ants contain formic acid., 'But judging from the picture I could say that it might test like Thai papaya salad which I really love.', 'It is so good idiet food because it has less fat and calories than chicken eggs.', In some tribal areas in India, like Bastar, they make a 'chutney' (dip) with ground ants., 'Also, insects use less water and other resources pound for pound to provide protein.', In fact, I've even seen an ant topping on a dessert in a Michlein star restaurant in France., 'Ants are quite edible and are widely consumed all over the world.', 'Ant egg is a good source of protein.', 'So some bold star restaurants do ants as well.', 'They have songs and dance performances just for the methods to get ant eggs from the trees.
ref: Ant egg is eatable and being eaten in many part of the world mainly in Asian country. It is a source of protein. Most of the time it is served as an omelet. It is so popular in some part of Thailand and even become a culture to eat ant egg.

hyp: Ants, especially red ones, produce formic acid to sting predators, capture food and defend themselves.', 'One Internet expert says the formic acid in ants makes them taste citrusy, like a lemon.', 'Ants are edible and there are people that eat them as a delicacy not usually as primary source of food.', 'In Laos (Lao PDR), there is a salad which includes live ants and ants' eggs.', 'Actually i didn't try it but as i know ants contain formic acid.', 'But judging from the picture I could say that it might test like Thai papaya salad which I really love.', 'It is so good idiet food because it has less fat and calories than chicken eggs.', 'In some tribal areas in India, like Bastar, they make a 'chutney' (dip) with ground ants.', 'Also, insects use less water and other resources pound for pound to provide protein.', 'In fact, I've even seen an ant topping on a dessert in a Michlein star restaurant in France.', 'Ants are quite edible and are widely consumed all over the world.', 'Ant egg is a good source of protein.', 'So some bold star restaurants do ants as well.', 'They have songs and dance performances just for the methods to get ant eggs from the trees.', 'In some countries in South America, they sell chocolate covered ants.', 'they put these into omelette, it was super creamy in weirdly good way lol.', 'They have a poison gland in their abdomen that contracts and releases the acid.', 'Formic acid, I’m told, is bitter.', 'Not sure, so please don't flame me if the name of the restaurant is wrong).', 'In facts, it is widely eaten, especially, in North and Northeast of Thailand.
ref: Ant egg is eatable and being eaten in many part of the world mainly in Asian country. It is a source of protein. Most of the time it is served as an omelet. It is so popular in some part of Thailand and even become a culture to eat ant egg.
